item.title: The self-confessed Sabrina Carpenter fan normally heads straight to her bedroom for "three or four hours" to watch YouTube videos of her pop idol and chat to her friends. #BBCTeenSummit #Technology #SocialMedia #Student #BBCNews

item.title: The BBC asked 259 colleges across England whether they taught an inclusive curriculum that covers afro hair care - of the 237 that responded, only 82 said they do. #Hair #AfroHair #Hairdresser #BBCNews

item.title: A judge in New York state has dismissed two terrorism charges against Luigi Mangione, the alleged killer of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, but ruled second-degree murder charges could stand. #LuigiMangione #UnitedHealthcare #BrianThompson #BBCNews

item.title: When the mysterious death of a 23-year-old Ugandan in Dubai goes viral, she becomes the face of the disturbing 'Dubai Porta Potty' trend. BBC Eye Investigations finds that behind the rumours lies an even darker reality. #BBCAfricaEye #Dubai #Investigatio

item.title: Traditionally, US presidents serving a second term - such as Donald Trump - are not offered a state visit. Instead, they are invited for tea or lunch with the monarch, as happened with former presidents Barack Obama and George W Bush. #DonaldTrump #KingCh
item.description: Traditionally, US presidents serving a second term - such as Donald Trump - are not offered a state visit. Instead, they are invited for tea or lunch with the monarch, as happened with former presidents Barack Obama and George W Bush. #DonaldTrump #KingCh

item.title: The suspected shooter of Charlie Kirk faces seven charges, including aggravated murder and witness tampering - Utah County Attorney Jeff Gray says he will seek the death penalty. #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: The suspected shooter of Charlie Kirk faces seven charges, including aggravated murder and witness tampering - Utah County Attorney Jeff Gray says he will seek the death penalty. #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews

item.title: Tyler Robinson allegedly left a note under his keyboard for his roommate, saying "I had the opportunity to take out Charlie Kirk, and I'm going to take it". #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: Tyler Robinson allegedly left a note under his keyboard for his roommate, saying "I had the opportunity to take out Charlie Kirk, and I'm going to take it". #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews

item.title: Tyler Robinson, the alleged killer of Charlie Kirk, said in messages that he would turn himself in, before asking his roommate not to speak to the media and to ask for a lawyer. #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews
